description: PDFMyWeb is a small utility which allows saving Web-pages and RSS feeds as PDF files on your WebOS device for offline reading. You just enter the URL of a Web-page or RSS feed, which you want to save, press "Get PDF" button and download a copy of Web-page or feed in PDF format. PDFMyWeb Pro allows sending PDF files by SMS or by E-Mail. It uploads your PDF file to SMSMyFile free file hosting service, retrieves the URL of uploaded file and seds it by SMS or by E-Mail. PDFMyWeb Pro allows downloading PDF files in grayscale and in low quality to save traffic.
